sense.def:
Če je neki dogodek ali položaj
due to something else
, se zgodi ali obstaja kot posledica nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: Over 40 per cent of deaths were due to this disease.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
due at a particular time
, pričakujemo, da se bo ob določenem času zgodilo ali prispelo.

seg.quote: What time is the bus due?
The committee was due to meet on 22 August.
All will be attended to in due course.

sense.def:
Dues
so vsote denarja, ki jih redno plačujemo organizaciji, katere član smo.

Če kdo za neki znesek reče:
it is due to me
, ima pravico do njega.

seg.quote: You may get slightly less than the full amount due to you.

sense.def:
To give something due consideration
pomeni nečemu posvetiti toliko premisleka, kolikor si zasluži.

seg.quote: After due consideration of the evidence, the meeting decided that no one had been to blame.

sense.def:
Besedo
due
uporabimo, ko govorimo o natančnih smereh na kompasu. Na primer:
due north
pomeni natančno na sever.
